verse.name: v1a
verse.lines: Amazing grace how sweet the sound, That saved a wretch like me;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: I once was lost, but now am found Was blind, but now I see.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines: T'was grace that taught my heart to fear, And grace my fears relieved;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines: How precious did that grace appear The hour I first believed.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Through many dangers, toil and snares, I have already come;
'

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines: Tis grace has brought me safe thus far, And grace will lead me home.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines: When we've been there ten thousand years Bright shining as the sun,

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines: We've no less days to sing God's praise Than when we've first begun.
